item.description:
Welcome to Westborough Spirituality meeting group.

Last month, we had a great meeting. Thanks Deborah, Donnamarie,Gregory,Jan, Jim, Leanne, Paul, Peter, Shang sheng and Ximena.
We discussed about bring peace energy to the whole world start from ourselves and how to calm down our monkey mind and also practice in our life.

This month's meeting we can share more about our spiritual life and How we practice in our daily life!

I would like to welcome all the friends with peaceful mind to join!

If you like to meet more friends with the same interest about seeking a spiritual life, please come and share your thoughts and experiences about how to practice spirituality in daily life.

About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: 147 will be the second building on your R. hand side after drive into condos.
item.name: The Westborough Spirituality February Meetup
